main.name: Binod Pant
main.description: I am a full-stack java developer with more than 5 years of experience with US and Europe-based companies. I worked with different domains such as finance, healthcare, and government. I have worked in different stacks such as Java, javascript, typescript, Spring, microservices, Hibernate/JPA, React, and Cloud

education.description: All students and faculty at MIU practice the Transcendental Meditation (TM) technique. This simple technique offers remarkable benefits for education, as extensive research shows — integrated brain functioning, increased creativity and intelligence, reduced stress, improved learning ability, improved academic performance (GPA), improved ability to focus, improved health, and many more.
Pokhara Vishwavidala (Pokhara University) is a higher education company based out of Gandaki, Nepal.

work.title: Software Engineer

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: SMAT was created in 2020 to enable the European Wealth Management community to access more easily traditional and digital alternative investment opportunities. Designed as a marketplace, SMAT offers a wide range of private equity and private debt deals which have been carefully selected. Soon, it will also include digital assets, starting with major cryptocurrencies and decentralized financial services.
